alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 1:34AM CDT until July 02 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ELLSWORTH COUNTY... At 133 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kanopolis, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kanopolis, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
